title: The Media was Always Fake
author: VD
content_html:
Politico is going under because it’s no longer being propped up by USAID.

This is the biggest scandal in news media history:

No employee at Politico got paid yesterday. First time ever the company missed a pay period. This is a crisis.

Now we learn Politico — a “news company” — which spent the last 10 years trying to destroy the MAGA Movement was being massively funded by USAID.

Trump & Elon deleted their funding.

Now Politico will go out of business.

The corruption is endless.

Good riddance

The biggest scandal in news media history… so far. I’m confident that there are US news organizations that were taking a lot more than $8.2 $32 million from the federal government.

UPDATE: Both the BBC and the New York Times received at least $3 million from USAID.

FULL DISCLOSURE: Neither I, nor Castalia, nor Arkhaven, nor Unauthorized have ever provided services to or received any funding from USAID.

DISCUSS ON SG
